title: Summer Friday #5: Midterm Cram (ft. Asha Rangappa, Former FBI Agent) | Summer Book Club
description:
In a new edition of Midterm Cram, Late Night writer Sal Gentile and producer Henry Melcher interview former FBI special agent Asha Rangappa about the threat of Russian interference in the upcoming elections, as well as the historically unusual nature of the Paul Manafort trial. Her interview begins at 5:23. (This interview was recorded on August 10.)

Then at 35:30, hear summer reading recommendations from Awkwafina, Lester Holt, Phoebe Robinson, Viet Thanh Nguyen and Jake Tapper.

All music by The 8G Band.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
